page.title: 10Spending leisure time
page.content: In a survey to discover what people liked to do in their spare time we found that the most popular activity was gardening.Amongst some other activities were walking,shopping and playing all sorts of sports. Socializing was also popular such as spending time going to the pub or talking over the garden fence. We also asked if they had an annual holiday, 76% said yes.The most popular type of holiday was going to the seaside,34% had that type.17% went abroad for their holidays.Another popular type of holiday was the countryside and camping which was 24% of the survey.About 12% went to hostels and a small number 4% went touring.
